channel.title: Port forwarded, and got No-IP but still cant connect to server
channel.description:
Okay so I forwarded port 43594 with TCP, and I tryed enabling 43594 through firewall, and still my NO-IP doesnt work when I try to login while 0.0.0.0 works, I need help with this because me and my friends want to play it.
And I have also clicked the box beside my NO-IP server adress to enable it.
PLS HELP! :(

item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Did you happen to forget to run the actual server?

Nah take down your firewall,
And make sure the Smiley face on no-ip.duc is “Blushing”.
